settings.announcement_message: We make branding easy ... come see what we can do together!

settings.title: Practices for health and enhancement
settings.content: Nootropics, also known as smart drugs and cognitive enhancers, are drugs, supplements, and other substances that improve cognitive function, particularly executive functions, memory, creativity, or motivation.  Amaroli  ( Sanskrit : अमरोलि amaroli and अमरोली amarolī f. ) Is a practice of sublimating sexual energy . In the Hatha Yoga Pradipika (chapter 3, verses 92, 96-98), besides Sahajoli Mudra, it is considered a special form of execution of Vajroli Mudra , which involves drinking one's own urine ( Amari , Shivambu ) and taking it via the nose ( Nasya ) is connected.
